nodes.id: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

zh-cn: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战期间，由法国、大英帝国、俄罗斯帝国等国组成的军事同盟，与同盟国对敌并最终获胜。
description.en: A military alliance during World War I, consisting of countries such as France, the British Empire, and the Russian Empire, which opposed the Central Powers and ultimately emerged victorious.

nodes.id: 同盟国 (第一次世界大战)

zh-cn: 同盟国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战期间与协约国对敌的军事同盟。
description.en: A military alliance that fought against the Entente Powers during World War I.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战前由法国、英国和俄罗斯组成的军事同盟，是协约国的前身。
description.en: A military alliance formed by France, Britain, and Russia before World War I, which was the predecessor to the Entente Powers.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，曾任法国总理，是协约国“四大巨头”之一。
description.en: French politician who served as Prime Minister of France and was one of the 'Big Four' of the Entente Powers.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，曾任英国首相，是协约国“四大巨头”之一。
description.en: British politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and was one of the 'Big Four' of the Entente Powers.

nodes.id: 维托里奥·埃曼努尔·奥兰多

zh-cn: 维托里奥·埃曼努尔·奥兰多

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家，曾任意大利总理，是协约国“四大巨头”之一。
description.en: Italian politician who served as Prime Minister of Italy and was one of the 'Big Four' of the Entente Powers.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国总统，是协约国“四大巨头”之一。
description.en: American politician who served as President of the United States and was one of the 'Big Four' of the Entente Powers.

description.zh-cn: 协约国的主要成员国之一。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Entente Powers.

description.zh-cn: 协约国的主要成员国之一。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Entente Powers.

description.zh-cn: 协约国的主要成员国之一，于1917年退出战争。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Entente Powers, withdrew from the war in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 协约国的主要成员国之一，于1915年加入。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Entente Powers, joined in 1915.

description.zh-cn: 协约国的主要成员国之一，于1917年加入。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Entente Powers, joined in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战结束后，由获胜的协约国召开的和平会议。
description.en: A peace conference convened by the victorious Entente Powers after the end of World War I.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后成立的国际组织，协约国是其主要前身。
description.en: An international organization established after World War I, for which the Entente Powers were the main predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 同盟国的核心成员国。
description.en: The core member state of the Central Powers.

description.zh-cn: 同盟国的主要成员国之一。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Central Powers.

description.zh-cn: 同盟国的主要成员国之一。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Central Powers.

description.zh-cn: 同盟国的主要成员国之一。
description.en: One of the main member states of the Central Powers.

en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

description.zh-cn: 大英帝国的核心组成部分。
description.en: The core component of the British Empire.

description.en: A member state of the Entente Powers.

relationships.source: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)
relationships.target: 同盟国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 在第一次世界大战中互为敌对的军事同盟。
description.en: Opposing military alliances during World War I.

relationships.target: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 三国协约是协约国军事同盟的前身和核心基础。
description.en: The Triple Entente was the predecessor and core foundation of the Entente Powers military alliance.

relationships.source: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)
relationships.target: 巴黎和会

description.zh-cn: 协约国在第一次世界大战胜利后召开了巴黎和会。
description.en: The Entente Powers convened the Paris Peace Conference after their victory in World War I.

relationships.source: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)
relationships.target: 国际联盟

description.zh-cn: 协约国是国际联盟的主要前身。
description.en: The Entente Powers were the main predecessor to the League of Nations.

relationships.target: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 作为主要协约国之一参战。
description.en: Participated in the war as one of the main Entente Powers.

relationships.target: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 作为主要协约国之一参战。
description.en: Participated in the war as one of the main Entente Powers.

relationships.target: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 作为主要协约国之一参战，于1917年2月退出。
description.en: Participated in the war as one of the main Entente Powers, withdrawing in February 1917.

relationships.target: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 于1915年加入协约国参战。
description.en: Joined the Entente Powers to participate in the war in 1915.

relationships.target: 协约国 (第一次世界大战)

description.zh-cn: 于1917年加入协约国参战。
description.en: Joined the Entente Powers to participate in the war in 1917.

relationships.source: 维托里奥·埃曼努尔·奥兰多

relationships.target: 美国
大卫·劳合乔治

description.zh-cn: 作为协约国领导人（“四大巨头”及“三大领袖”），共同主导第一次世界大战及战后巴黎和会。
description.en: As leaders of the Entente Powers (the 'Big Four' and 'Big Three'), they jointly led during World War I and at the subsequent Paris Peace Conference.

relationships.target: 维托里奥·埃曼努尔·奥兰多

relationships.target: 法兰西第三共和国

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国对法兰西第三共和国宣战。
description.en: The German Empire declared war on the French Third Republic.

relationships.target: 大英帝国

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国对大英帝国宣战。
description.en: The German Empire declared war on the British Empire.

relationships.target: 俄罗斯帝国

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国对俄罗斯帝国宣战。
description.en: The German Empire declared war on the Russian Empire.

relationships.target: 比利时

description.zh-cn: 德意志帝国入侵比利时。
description.en: The German Empire invaded Belgium.

relationships.target: 塞尔维亚王国 (近代)

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国对塞尔维亚王国宣战，引发第一次世界大战。
description.en: Austria-Hungary declared war on the Kingdom of Serbia, triggering World War I.
